sect1.title: Possible Extensions
sect1.para: The Task Tree can be extended by adding new flag types. This can be achieved by implementing the TaskTreeFlag interface described in .

Most methods are rather easy to code. Be careful about the enumeration values your flag will accept, so that ordinal numbers are always within your supported range. It is recommended to use a separate enumeration for each flag type.

The inherit() method is the only point where some deeper thoughts are needed. Example implementations of elementary tree flags are available in the BasicFlags enumeration. This code is good to start with when implementing your own flags and illustrates how the inherit() method is supposed to operate.
